Author: Decker#3767
Content: Windows users of Komodo-Qt probably will like installer (!), bcz it automatically downloads ZCash Params (if needed) and creates `komodo.conf` file.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: https://discordapp.com/channels/412898016371015680/459072527323365390/576485789290987520 - how the installer looks.

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: @Decker That zip file didn't work for me and I kept getting an error no what matter what i tried

Author: Decker#3767
Content: If we are talking about Windows installer - there is no any zip.

Author: Decker#3767
Content:
`komodo-qt-win.zip` - static binaries of Komodo-Qt for Windows
`komodo-qt-win.exe` - Windows Installer

Author: Decker#3767
Content: Feel the difference between zip with binaries, and installer.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: In case of installer it automatically downloads ZCash Params and creates komodo.conf, in case of zip with binaries - you'll need to fetch ZCash params manually and create komodo.conf, also manually.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: So, if you are not experienced with this, or don't understand what is the ZCash Params or komodo.conf file - read the docs, or just use the installer.

Author: weldon.gull5#3242
Content: Excuse me, if the wallet is encrypted, how can I export the private key? How to decrypt the wallet first

Author: Decker#3767
Content: You should unlock wallet first.

Author: weldon.gull5#3242
Content: @Decker How to unlock? I don't see the unlock wallet option in the menu.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: Same way as in Bitcoin Core and other wallets.

Author: Decker#3767
Content:
Help -> Debug window -> Console:
```
walletpassphrase "passphrase" timeout
```

Author: weldon.gull5#3242
Content: thank you

Author: Helly88#3715
Content: @jl777c When will a Trezor connection finally come? You can see what happens if you don't have a hardware wallet. On the Trezor page it says that there is no wallet from KMD yet. When can one count on it

Author: Decker#3767
Content: Hardware wallets is not 100% safe, bcz you can't be sure what actually you will receive with the next firmware update. It's a question of trust )

Author: Decker#3767
Content: Let's imagine, just theoretically that somebody hacked Ledger firmware update servers ) And inject a code to change a transactions before sign. You trying to send coins on address X ... Ledger shows you address X and needed amount ... but after you pressed a button, coins will be sent on address Y. Just a theoretical case, but also possible.

Author: Helly88#3715
Content: When Trezor ??

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: How do I rescan the wallet in Windows on restart?

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: `./KomodoOceanQT -rescan` ?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: try it

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: I like you.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: And I know you like me.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: You know why?

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: Because I didn't come back and say "That didn't work"

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: Instead just trying it gave me enough info to figure it out.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: `./KomodoOceanGUI.exe -rescan`

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
Shift and Right click the folder KomodoOcean 
-> Then choose `Open Powershell Window Here` 
-> then type `./KomodoOceanGUI.exe -rescan`
